enabling:

press:
01 00 00 02 00 08 00 00 00 2C 
01 06 01 02 01 01 00 00 00 2B 
01 06 02 02 01 01 00 00 00 2A 
02 00 00 02 44 02 02 02 02 02 02 00 00 63

release:
01 00 00 02 00 00 00 00 00 34



disabling:

press:
01 00 00 02 00 08 00 00 00 2C 
01 06 01 02 01 00 00 00 00 2C 
01 06 02 02 01 00 00 00 00 2B 
02 00 00 02 44 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 6F

release:
01 00 00 02 00 00 00 00 00 34
